revision.text:
{{expand article|date=August 2012}} An '''island province''' or an '''island state''' is a [[province]] or [[state (subnational)|state]] with jurisdictional extent encompassing the whole land area of an [[island]].
A province cannot be called an "island province" if a certain part of the island is governed or administered by a separate province.{{says who|date=August 2012}} Some provinces include several smaller islands.
Some of the recognisable island provinces are: * [[Bali]] in [[Indonesia]] * [[Cebu]] in the [[Philippines]] * [[Dinagat Islands]] * [[Easter Island]] (Islas de Pascua or Rapa Nui) in [[Chile]] * [[Hainan]] in the [[People's Republic of China]] * [[Hawaii]] in the [[United States]] * [[Jeju-do]] in [[South Korea]] * [[Loyalty Islands]] * [[Phuket Province|Phuket]] in [[Thailand]] * [[Prince Edward Island]] in [[Canada]] * [[Riau Islands Province]] * [[Tasmania]] in [[Australia]] * [[Western Province (Solomon Islands)]]
==Historical island provinces== * [[Sanuki Province]]
==See also== * [[Island country]]
==References== {{reflist}} * [http://www.abs-cbnnews.com/nation/regions/02/11/10/sc-says-dinagat-islands-no-longer-province SC says Dinagat Islands no longer a province | ABS-CBN News<!-- Bot generated title -->] * [http://pqasb.pqarchiver.com/latimes/access/642480792.html?dids=642480792:642480792&FMT=ABS&FMTS=ABS:AI&type=historic&date=Dec+16%2C+1976&author=&pub=Los+Angeles+Times&desc=Island+Province+Is+Canada's+Smallest&pqatl=google Los Angeles Times: Archives - Island Province Is Canada's Smallest<!-- Bot generated title -->] * [http://www.mb.com.ph/node/259113/i Island province of Guimaras: The perfect last stop this summer | The Manila Bulletin Newspaper Online<!-- Bot generated title -->]
